author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 20-year-old engineering student ended his life by hanging in the hostel room of the institution where he was studying on Tuesday.

Police gave the name of the victim as R. Shivamurthy – who was a B.E. second year computer science student with Oxford Engineering College at Pirattiyur. The student, belonging to Dalit community, hailed from Sivagiri taluk in Tirunelveli district.

Police sources said the student, who returned from his native place on Monday, attended classes in the morning.

However, he did not attend the afternoon session and remained in the hostel room. The student is said to have hanged himself from the ceiling fan using the iron box cable. His college mates found him hanging and immediately took him to the hospital, but in vain.

The E. Pudur police are investigating.

Help for those affected by stress related to exams is available on the State’s helpline 104 or Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline is 044-24640050.
title: Engineering student commits suicide
